visits.text: Explore Chinatown (Yaowarat Road, Samphanthawong District), lively streets and Chinese temples.

activities.text: Walk through food markets and taste local street food in Chinatown.

visits.text: Visit the Grand Palace and the Emerald Buddha Temple.
Visit Wat Pho, the temple of the Reclining Buddha.

activities.text: Stroll around Khao San Road in the evening for nightlife and street markets.

visits.text: Visit Chatuchak Weekend Market (open Sat-Sun).
Explore MBK Center, a popular shopping complex for bargains and souvenirs.
Relax at Lumphini Park.

activities.text: Sample local food stalls inside Chatuchak Market.

visits.text: Discover Ayutthaya Historical Park — Wat Mahathat, Wat Chaiwatthanaram, Wat Phra Si Sanphet.

activities.text: Take a guided day tour from Bangkok to Ayutthaya with a private driver.

visits.text: Walk through Chiang Mai Old City and visit local temples.
Explore Chiang Mai Night Bazaar.

activities.text: Dinner and music at Ploen Ruedee Night Market (food trucks).
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Visit Elephant Jungle Sanctuary for ethical elephant care.
Visit Wat Phra That Doi Suthep with panoramic city views.

activities.text: Learn about Buddhist traditions and monk meditation at Doi Suthep.

visits.text: Stroll through Phuket Town and local markets.

activities.text: Book next-day island tour (James Bond or Phi Phi).
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Excursion to James Bond Island (Ko Tapu) and Hong Islands.
Stop at Koh Panyee floating village.

activities.text: Kayak in limestone caves around Hong Islands.

visits.text: Travel from Phuket to Koh Tao via Surat Thani and ferry.

activities.text: Relax at the seaside hotel Bamboo Huts by Charm Churee.
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Diving baptism with Pura Vida Diving School (2 immersions).

activities.text: Attend diving theory and safety briefing, followed by open-water dive.

visits.text: Visit Jansom Bay, Shark Bay, and Chalok Baan Kao Bay.

activities.text: Snorkeling at Shark Bay (weather permitting).

visits.text: Ferry trip from Koh Tao to Koh Phangan (1h30).
Evening stroll at Phantip Night Food Market, Thong Sala.

activities.text: Relax on Baan Manali Resort private beach.

visits.text: Phangan Bicycle Tour — explore jungle, temples, and fruit farms.

activities.text: Taste tropical fruits and visit local villages.

visits.text: Boat excursion to Bottle Beach and snorkeling stop near Chaloklum.

activities.text: Relax and swim at Bottle Beach (Haad Khuat).

visits.text: Ferry to Surat Thani + flight back to Bangkok.

activities.text: Prepare for international departure at Bangkok airport.

itineraries.title: THAILAND HIGHLIGHTS: FROM TEMPLES TO TROPICAL BEACHES IN 14 DAYS

visits.text: Visit Wat Phra Kaew and the Grand Palace, Bangkok's most sacred temple complex
Explore Wat Pho and admire the 46-meter-long Reclining Buddha

activities.text: Take a ferry to Wat Arun and climb the central prang for river views

visits.text: Discover Chatuchak Weekend Market with thousands of local stalls
Wander through Chinatown and sample famous street food

activities.text: Evening tuk-tuk ride through Banglamphu and Khao San Road
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Admire the intricate White Temple (Wat Rong Khun)
Explore the Blue Temple (Wat Rong Suea Ten)
Visit Baan Dam, the Black House Museum

activities.text: Evening stroll at Chiang Rai Night Bazaar

visits.text: Discover Wat Chedi Luang and Wat Phra Singh in Chiang Mai Old City
Explore Wat Chiang Man, the oldest temple in Chiang Mai

activities.text: Shop and eat at the Tha Phae Walking Street Night Market

visits.text: Climb to Wat Phra That Doi Suthep for panoramic city views
Hike to Wat Pha Lat through lush jungle trails

activities.text: Relax in the Nimman neighborhood cafés and boutiques
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Take a longtail boat to Railay Beach and explore Phra Nang Cave
Relax on Ao Nang Beach

activities.text: Evening seafood dinner overlooking Krabi Bay

visits.text: Boat excursion to the Hong Islands and snorkeling
Visit the Tiger Cave Temple and climb the 1,237 steps to the viewpoint

activities.text: Evening stroll at Krabi Night Market

visits.text: Explore Khao Sok National Park jungle trails
Take a longtail boat on Cheow Lan Lake to see limestone cliffs

activities.text: Canoeing on the Sok River and wildlife spotting

visits.text: Visit Wat Plai Laem and Big Buddha Temple
Relax at Chaweng Beach

activities.text: Evening in Fisherman's Village, Bophut

visits.text: Discover Haad Yuan and Haad Rin beaches
Explore Than Sadet Waterfall National Park

activities.text: Snorkeling trip in Mae Haad Bay

visits.text: Scuba dive at Japanese Gardens or Shark Bay
Climb to John-Suwan Viewpoint for panoramic island views

activities.text: Relax on Sairee Beach at sunset

visits.text: Shop at Siam Paragon and MBK Center
Visit Jim Thompson House for Thai art and architecture

activities.text: Dinner cruise on the Chao Phraya River

visits.text: Day trip to Ayutthaya Historical Park, former capital of Siam
Explore the ruins and temples by bicycle

activities.text: Return to Bangkok for final evening shopping

visits.text: Relaxing morning or optional spa treatment

activities.text: Transfer to Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport for departure

itineraries.title: SOUTH THAILAND ROAD TRIP: FROM HUA HIN TO THE MALAYSIAN BORDER

visits.text: Visit Wat Khao Chong Kaeo temple overlooking Prachuap Bay.
Walk along Prachuap Khiri Khan seafront and view Ao Manao Beach.

activities.text: Scenic coastal drive from Hua Hin to Prachuap Khiri Khan.
Set up camp in Prachuap Khiri Khan National Park.

visits.text: Explore Huai Yang Waterfall National Park.
Hike to Chum Saeng Waterfall and swim in the natural pools.

activities.text: Camp in Prachuap Khiri Khan National Park.

visits.text: Walk around Ranong Port and observe local fishing boats.
Relax at Raksawarin Hot Springs surrounded by lush forest.

activities.text: Drive through the forested mountains from Prachuap Khiri Khan to Ranong.

visits.text: Visit Khao Sok National Park and hike through its rainforest trails.
Take a long-tail boat on Cheow Lan Lake and admire limestone karsts.

activities.text: Relax at Bang Niang Beach near Khao Lak.

visits.text: Walk along Khao Lampi Beach and visit Lampi Waterfall.
Explore Phuket Old Town’s Sino-Portuguese architecture.

activities.text: Swim and relax at Patong Beach.

visits.text: Climb to the Big Buddha of Phuket and enjoy panoramic views.
Stroll in Krabi Town’s night market.

activities.text: Scenic coastal drive from Phuket to Krabi.

visits.text: Relax on Hat Yao Beach in Trang Province.
Visit Krabi’s Tiger Cave Temple before leaving the province.

activities.text: Swim and camp on Hat Yao Beach.

visits.text: Kayak to Koh Libong Island and explore mangroves and limestone formations.

activities.text: Snorkeling near Koh Libong’s coral reefs.

visits.text: Discover the countryside of Satun Province and mountain views.
Walk along Thale Ban National Park trails.

activities.text: Drive from Trang to Satun through lush valleys.

visits.text: Walk around Sadao Lake Reservoir.
Enjoy sunset views from Chalung Town area.

activities.text: Drive through rural Songkhla Province towards Yala.

visits.text: Explore Yala City’s central market and mosque.
Visit local temples and cultural sites.

activities.text: Scenic drive from Sadao to Yala through dense forest routes.

visits.text: Visit Bang Lang Reservoir and its scenic viewpoints.
Walk along Narathiwat’s riverfront and explore the local night market.

activities.text: Drive from Yala to Narathiwat through tropical countryside.

itineraries.title: ULTIMATE NORTHERN THAILAND ROAD TRIP: TEMPLES, TRIBES AND MOUNTAIN LANDSCAPES

visits.text: Visit Wat Phra That Doi Suthep, a hilltop temple with panoramic views and ornate Lanna-style architecture.
Walk through Chiang Mai Old City and admire temples such as Wat Chedi Luang and Wat Phra Singh.

activities.text: Join a local family in a traditional Lanna-style home to prepare and share a Khantoke dinner.

visits.text: Explore Doi Inthanon National Park, Thailand’s highest peak, with forest trails and waterfalls like Wachirathan and Siriphum.

activities.text: Trek the Kew Mae Pan Nature Trail for breathtaking views and lush vegetation.

visits.text: Stop at Bua Tong Field at Doi Mae Ou Kor to see wild sunflowers in bloom during November and December.
Visit Wat Phra That Doi Kong Mu for panoramic views of Mae Hong Son and surrounding mountains.
Explore Wat Chong Kam and Wat Chong Klang, twin Burmese-style temples beside a serene lake.

activities.text: Browse Mae Hong Son’s night market and discover colorful hill-tribe handicrafts.

visits.text: Walk across Su Tong Pae Bridge, the longest bamboo bridge in Thailand, and make a wish for good fortune.
Discover the lakeside village of Ban Rak Thai surrounded by mountains and tea plantations.

activities.text: Relax at Phu Klon Country Club Health Mud Spa for a mineral-rich mud treatment and aromatherapy massage.
Taste premium local teas like Ching and Oolong in Ban Rak Thai village.

visits.text: Explore Tham Nam Lot, Thailand’s largest cave system, filled with impressive stalactites and stalagmites.
Visit Pai Canyon (Kong Laen) to admire dramatic cliffs and sunset views.
Watch the sunrise from Yun-Lai Viewpoint for breathtaking views of the Pai Valley.

activities.text: Stroll through Pai’s lively night market and try authentic northern Thai street food.

visits.text: Drive back to Chiang Mai with scenic stops in mountain villages.

activities.text: Enjoy a farewell dinner in Chiang Mai’s Old Town.
